doc.title: Domus

composers.composer: Music Academy of the West Orchestra

doc.plot: Domus leads you into the intriguing world of the never before filmed private residence of world renowned designer, John Saladino. Experience a masterful expression of the unique dance between life, art and the careful design of a lifestyle that tirelessly defines the meaning of artful living. Directed and edited by Ethan Boehme, this metaphorical journey reveals the profound meaning in a human dwelling.
